    • Method Detail

      • setParams

        public static void setParams(MappingStrategy sms,
                             PreparedStatement statement,
                             List<SQLParam> params)
                      throws SQLException

        This method binds the "?" markers in SQL statement with the parameters given as values. It concentrates the replacement of all params. GuardedString are handled so the password is never visible.

        Parameters:
        sms -
        statement -
        params - a List of the object arguments
        Throws:
        SQLException - an exception in statement

      • setParams

                      throws SQLException

        This method binds the "?" markers in SQL statement with the parameters given as values. It concentrates the replacement of all params. GuardedString are handled so the password is never visible.

        statement -
        params - a List of the object arguments

      • getColumnValues

        public static Map<String,SQLParam> getColumnValues(MappingStrategy sms,
                                                   ResultSet resultSet)
                                            throws SQLException
        Read one row from database result set and convert it to columnValues map.
        Parameters:
        sms - a mapping strategy
        resultSet - database data
        Returns:
        The transformed column values map
        Throws:
        SQLException

      • quoteName

        public static String quoteName(String quoting,
                               String value)
        Used to escape the table or column name.
        Parameters:
        quoting - the string double, single, back, brackets
        value - Value to be quoted
        Returns:
        the quoted column name
